rows.text_1:
Children learn best by playing and doing. 

Let’s see how @data.characters.f1_father.name helps his children learn different skills through playing.

rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f1_father.name: “It can be hard to wait, but we cannot all go first. @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, how do you think we could take turns throwing the ball?  

 @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: “Let’s make a circle! I will throw the ball to @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, then he throws it to you @data.characters.f1_father.name, and you throw it back to me!”

@data.characters.f1_son_5.name: “Yes, that sounds great!”

 @data.characters.f1_father.name: “That’s a fantastic idea, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! Let’s give it a try!”

@data.characters.f1_father.name: “Well done, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! You took the lead, and we all had so much fun taking turns! @data.characters.f1_son_5.name, you were also great at patiently waiting for your turn.”

rows.text_1: @data.characters.f1_father.name helped his children learn by playing with them. Let’s explore how he did this.
rows.quiz_1_question: What skills did @data.characters.f1_father.name teach his children?
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Yes, he showed them how to kick the ball, and helped them learn other skills as well - all by playing!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: Yes, he involved them in solving a problem, and helped them learn other skills as well - all by playing!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: Yes, he supported them to learn to take turns, and helped them learn other skills as well - all by playing!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_4: Yes, he helped them practise being patient, and supported them to learn other skills as well - all by playing!
rows.quiz_1_feedback_5: Yes, he invited them to take the lead, and helped them learn other skills as well - all by playing!
rows.quiz_2_question: How did @data.characters.f1_father.name help his children learn these skills?
rows.quiz_2_feedback_1: Exactly! Their play time together had so many opportunities to learn new skills.
rows.quiz_2_feedback_2: Exactly! Their play time together had so many opportunities to learn new skills.
rows.quiz_2_option_3_text: By asking for their ideas and solutions
rows.quiz_2_feedback_3: Exactly! Their play time together had so many opportunities to learn new skills.
rows.quiz_2_feedback_4: Exactly! Their play time together had so many opportunities to learn new skills.

rows.text_1:
Children (just like us) can learn a lot from their mistakes.

Let’s look at how @data.characters.f3_uncle.name supports @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name to learn from her mistake when she plays a bit too rough indoors.

rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f3_uncle.name: “@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name, watch where you’re going! You’re going to break something.” 

 @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name: “No I won’t!”
*@data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name runs into a table and breaks a vase. @data.characters.f3_uncle.name sees and is concerned.*

@data.characters.f3_uncle.name: “Are you hurt??”

 @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name: “No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.name. I’m so, so sorry for breaking the vase… I didn’t see it.”

@data.characters.f3_uncle.name: “Thank you for realising your mistake and apologising. Do you know how you could have prevented that from happening?”

 @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name: “Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you warned me.”

@data.characters.f3_uncle.name: “It’s OK, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. I’m proud that you are able to learn from your mistakes. Let’s get a broom to sweep up the pieces. We may be able to repair the vase with some glue.”

 @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name: “Okay…”

rows.text_1: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f3_uncle.name helped @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learn from her mistake!
rows.quiz_1_option_1_text: He gives an instruction to prevent the mistake
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Yes, he warns her in order to avoid the mistake.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: Yes, when your child makes a mistake it is important to stay calm.
rows.quiz_1_option_3_text: He shows he cares most about @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: Yes, when the accident happens, he first asks if @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name is okay!
rows.quiz_1_option_4_text: He thanks @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name for recognising her mistake
rows.quiz_1_feedback_4: Yes, praise helps our children to take more responsibility for their actions next time.
rows.quiz_1_option_5_text: He asks @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name to reflect on her behaviour
rows.quiz_1_feedback_5: Yes, he helps her learn by asking her how she could have prevented the mistake.
rows.quiz_2_option_1_text: It is okay to make mistakes
rows.quiz_2_feedback_1: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
rows.quiz_2_option_2_text: I am still loved even if I make mistakes
rows.quiz_2_feedback_2: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
rows.quiz_2_option_3_text: I can learn from my mistakes
rows.quiz_2_feedback_3: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
rows.quiz_2_feedback_4: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
rows.quiz_1_option_6_text: He involves @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name to resolve the situation together
rows.quiz_1_feedback_6: Yes, by asking her to help clean up, he shows how she can make things right again after making a mistake.
rows.quiz_2_option_5_text: I can help to make things right again
rows.quiz_2_feedback_5: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name learns important things because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name responds in a calm and supportive way.
